title: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
provision: Offers life insurance cover of ₹2 lakh for death due to any reason for a premium of ₹436 per annum.
target: Individuals aged 18-50 years with a savings bank account and not a taxpayer.
amount: Coverage: ₹2,00,000; Premium: ₹436/year
process: Submit the PMJJBY consent form at the bank branch or enroll via net banking; premium auto-debited from the linked account annually.
description: Low-cost life insurance for bank account holders; ₹2 lakh cover with annual auto-debited premium.

title: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana
provision: Provides accidental death and disability cover of ₹2 lakh for death and ₹1 lakh for full disability at a premium of ₹20 per annum.
target: Individuals aged 18-70 years having a savings bank account.
amount: Coverage: ₹2,00,000 (death); ₹1,00,000 (full disability); Premium: ₹20/year
process: Submit SMSBY consent form at bank branch or via net banking; premium auto-debited from linked account.
description: Accidental death/disability cover at ₹20/year; ₹2 lakh for death or ₹1 lakh for disability.

title: Atal Pension Yojana
provision: Guarantees a minimum monthly pension of ₹1,000 to ₹5,000 to subscribers after reaching 60 years, based on contribution.
target: Individuals aged 18-40 years with a savings bank account and not an income taxpayer.
amount: Monthly pension ranging from ₹1,000-₹5,000 depending on contribution
process: Enroll through bank/post office or APY Service Providers; auto-debit monthly contribution.
description: Government-backed pension for unorganized workers; contribute now to receive ₹1k–₹5k monthly after 60.

title: Udyogini Scheme
provision: Provides interest-free loans up to ₹3 lakh with 30% subsidy and offers skill development training programmes.
target: Women entrepreneurs from economically weaker sections and backward areas.
amount: Loan tenure up to 7 years; Subsidy of 30% on the project cost (max ₹1 lakh)
process: Submit application at District Industries Centre or designated bank; project appraisal; sanction and disbursement.
description: Loans and training for women entrepreneurs; interest relief and subsidy to start or expand businesses.

title: Pradhan Mantri Matritva Vandana Yojana
provision: Cash incentive of ₹5,000 provided in three installments to pregnant and lactating mothers for the first living child.
target: Pregnant and lactating women aged 19+ for first live birth.
amount: ₹5,000 (₹1,000 on early registration; ₹2,000 after second trimester; ₹2,000 after child''s birth).
process: Register at Anganwadi/health centre; submit form; receive direct benefit transfer.
description: Cash support for first-time mothers; staged payments encourage timely care, nutrition, and safe delivery.

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
provision: Provides free LPG connection and ₹1,600 deposit support for BPL women to promote clean cooking fuel.
target: Women from Below Poverty Line (BPL) households.
amount: Free LPG connection; ₹1,600 financial support for LPG cylinder deposit.
process: Apply at nearest LPG distributor; ENO issues connection; subsidy credited via DBT.
description: Free LPG connections for BPL women with deposit support; enables a shift to clean cooking fuel.

title: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
provision: Long-term small savings scheme for girl children with higher interest rate to fund education/marriage.
target: Parents/guardians of a girl child aged below 10 years.
amount: Minimum deposit ₹250 per year; maximum ₹1.5 lakh per year; current interest rate 8.2% (compounded annually).
process: Submit SSA form at bank/post office; maintain regular deposits for 15 years.
description: High-interest savings for a girl child; tax-friendly corpus for education and marriage.

title: Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana
provision: Provides loans up to ₹10 lakh to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises.
target: Micro-entrepreneurs, small businesses in non-farm sectors.
amount: Loans up to ₹10 lakh under Shishu, Kishor and Tarun categories based on stage of growth.
process: Apply at MUDRA-empanelled banks or NBFC/SCB; project evaluation; loan sanction.
description: Collateral-free loans up to ₹10 lakh for micro and small businesses across growth stages.

title: Rashtriya Mahila Kosh
provision: Provides micro-credit up to ₹1 lakh for women''s livelihood and income-generation activities.
target: Women entrepreneurs, SHGs, NGOs for women development.
amount: Loans up to ₹1 lakh at concessional interest rates.
process: Apply through Mahila Arthik Vikas Mahasangh or designated bank; appraisal and disbursement.
description: Microcredit for women-led livelihoods via SHGs/NGOs; concessional loans for income generation.

title: Bharatiya Mahila Bank Business Loan Scheme
provision: Special business loans up to ₹20 lakh for women entrepreneurs at concessional rates.
target: Women proprietors of micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs).
amount: Loans up to ₹20 lakh; interest rate concession over bank''s MCLR.
process: Submit application at Bharatiya Mahila Bank branches (now merged under SBI); appraisal and sanction.
description: Concessional business loans for women-led MSMEs; supports new setups and expansion.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
provision: Universal access to banking facilities with zero-balance accounts, overdraft facility up to ₹10,000, and Rupay debit card.
target: Unbanked adults across rural and urban India.
amount: Zero-balance account; overdraft limit up to ₹10,000; accidental insurance cover ₹1-2 lakh.
process: Visit any bank branch or Business Correspondent with KYC documents; fill PMJDY form; receive Rupay card.
description: Zero-balance bank accounts with RuPay card, overdraft, and insurance to drive financial inclusion.

title: Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojana
provision: Health insurance cover up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for hospitalization expenses with premium subsidy.
target: Below Poverty Line (BPL) families and unorganized sector workers.
amount: Coverage up to ₹5 lakh/year; premium ₹30-₹60/year per family.
process: Obtain RSBY card through Gram Panchayat or authorized agencies; cashless treatment at empaneled hospitals.
description: Subsidized health insurance for BPL families; cashless hospitalization at empaneled hospitals.

title: National Pension Scheme
provision: Voluntary contribution-based pension scheme offering market-linked returns and tax benefits.
target: All Indian citizens aged 18-65 years.
amount: Contributions as chosen by subscriber; annuity depends on fund performance.
process: Open NPS account through Points of Presence (PoP) or online through eNPS portal; periodic contributions.
description: Flexible, market-linked retirement savings with tax benefits; build corpus and buy annuity at exit.

title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban & Gramin)
provision: Subsidy for affordable housing in urban (PMAY-U) and rural (PMAY-G) areas for EWS/LIG families.
target: Economically weaker sections (EWS) and low-income groups (LIG) in urban & rural India without pucca houses.
amount: Subsidy of ₹1.5-₹2.67 lakh on home loan interest; financial assistance up to ₹1.2 lakh for rural homes.
process: Apply online on PMAY-U portal or through Gram Panchayat for PMAY-G; selection under beneficiary list; sanctions.
description: Affordable housing assistance and interest subsidy for EWS/LIG; supports pucca homes in urban and rural areas.

title: MGNREGA
provision: Guarantees 100 days of wage employment per year to rural households for unskilled manual work.
target: Adult members of rural households willing to do unskilled manual work.
amount: Statutory minimum wage as per state rates for 100 days; unemployment allowance if work not provided.
requirements: Job Card issued by Gram Panchayat
process: Submit job card request at Gram Panchayat; works execution; wages directly credited to bank/post office account.
description: Guarantees paid unskilled work for rural households (up to 100 days); wages paid directly to bank accounts.

title: National Savings Certificate (NSC)
provision: Government savings bond with guaranteed return and tax benefits, ideal for small savers.
target: Individuals, HUFs, and trusts for long-term safe investment.
amount: Minimum ₹1,000; no upper limit; current interest rate 7.7% (compounded annually), maturity 5 years.
process: Purchase at post offices or authorized banks by submitting form and documents; certificate issued.
description: Safe, fixed-return savings certificate with tax benefits; 5-year maturity for small investors.

title: Fasal Bima Yojana
provision: Insurance for farmers against crop loss due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases.
target: All farmers, including sharecroppers and tenant farmers.
amount: Sum insured based on scale of finance; premium capped at 2% (Kharif) or 1.5% (Rabi) of sum insured.
requirements: Crop Loan Papers or Written Consent
process: Apply through lending bank or insurance company; premium subsidy directly credited to bank account.
description: Crop insurance against natural risks; low farmer premium with claims based on notified yields.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)
provision: Cashless health insurance cover of up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
target: Over 10.7 crore poor and vulnerable families identified via SECC data.
amount: Coverage: ₹5,00,000 per family per year; includes pre- and post-hospitalization expenses.
process: Identify eligible family using PM-JAY app; generate e-card at Common Service Centre; cashless treatment at empaneled hospitals.
description: Cashless health cover up to ₹5 lakh per family annually at empaneled hospitals for eligible households.

title: DDU-GKY
provision: Placement-linked skill training programme aiming to provide rural youth with sustainable employment.
target: Rural youth aged 15-35 years from poor families.
amount: Training cost covered by Government; placement-linked stipend and post-placement tracking.
process: Register at DDU-GKY training centers; undergo training; placement assistance provided.
description: Placement-linked skill training for rural youth; government-funded courses with job assistance.

title: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
provision: Short-term training and assessment certification for youth to improve employability in various sectors.
target: Indian youth aged 18-35 years seeking vocational training.
amount: Training cost up to ₹15,000 per candidate covered; assessment and certification free.
process: Enroll at PMKVY training centers; complete training; undergo assessment by SSC; receive certification.
description: Short-term vocational training with assessment and certification; improves employability across sectors.

title: National Rural Livelihood Mission (NRLM)
provision: Promotes multiple livelihood opportunities through self-help groups (SHGs), financial inclusion, and skill development.
target: Poor rural households, primarily women, organized into SHGs.
amount: Community investment funds, bank linkages, and convergence funds; subsidy varies by project.
process: Formation of SHGs; capacity building; credit linkages; livelihood project implementation.
description: SHG-based program for rural women; credit linkages and skills to build sustainable livelihoods.

title: Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana
provision: Focuses on urban poor by providing skill training, micro-enterprise support and social security.
target: Urban homeless, migrants, and poor groups.
amount: Interest subsidy on loans up to ₹5 lakh; seed capital grants; training stipends.
process: Enroll at Urban Local Bodies or ULB''s designated centers; skill training; credit linkage; enterprise support.
description: Urban livelihoods mission offering skills, enterprise support, and interest subsidies for the urban poor.

title: PMGDISHA
provision: Provides digital literacy to rural citizens by training on digital devices and services.
target: Rural households with at least one digitally illiterate member.
amount: Free training on basic digital skills; certification on completion.
process: Register at designated Common Service Centre (CSC); undergo 20-hour training; assessment and certification.
description: Free digital literacy training for rural households; learn devices, online services, and safety basics.

title: Stand-Up India Scheme
provision: Facilitates bank loans between ₹10 lakh and ₹1 crore to at least one woman or SC/ST borrower per bank branch.
target: Women entrepreneurs and SC/ST at non-farm sector enterprises.
amount: Loans ₹10 lakh-₹1 crore; interest rate as per bank''s lending rate minus 1%.
process: Submit Stand-Up India application via portal; in-principle approval; drawdown at bank branch.
description: Bank loans ₹10 lakh–₹1 crore to SC/ST or women entrepreneurs for new non-farm enterprises.

title: Pradhan Mantri Vaya Vandana Yojana
provision: Pension scheme offering a guaranteed return of 7.4% per annum payable monthly to senior citizens aged 60+.
target: Senior citizens aged 60 years and above.
amount: Minimum investment ₹1,000; maximum ₹15 lakh per senior citizen; pension rate 7.4% per annum.
process: Apply at Post Office or designated bank branch; submit application form and documents; receive monthly pension.
description: Senior citizen pension plan with assured returns; regular payouts from a safe, government-backed scheme.
